view.subtitle: Hours/lead-time baseline configured on biz metadata.

Create offer shell API Trace

requestBody.title: Configure default pricing rules API Trace

data.instruction: Create a booking order using the published offer version with realistic times and monetary totals.
data.expectedResult: Booking order is created and linked to offer/offer version with coherent totals.

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Actor/time metadata for every lifecycle transition". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Verification endpoint/workflow for checking key validity". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

data.instruction: Customer two attempts booking overlapping demand for the same offer/resource window.
data.expectedResult: System either books correctly under capacity rules or rejects with deterministic conflict response.
